snippet: Politics, not legal reasoning, is behind the assault on Obamacare that is now headed to the Supreme Court.
abstract: Paul Krugman Op-Ed column decries Supreme Court's decision to hear case that seeks to overturn the Affordable Care Act on the basis of a small error in law's language; argues that suit, which hinges on an aspect of the law that was not intended by those who drafted it, should have been laughed out of court long ago; holds that politics, rather than legal reasoning, is behind the Supreme Court's decision to hear it.
lead_paragraph: Politics, not legal reasoning, is behind the assault on Obamacare that is now headed to the Supreme Court.

headline.seo: The Latest Frivolous Attack on Obamacare

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
